message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you consider meeting me at $8500?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer. How about we try $9000?
